name: extrasafe
title: Extrasafe
description: Just Remember one Master Password to generate Different Passwords for Different Sites. We do NOT and will NEVER store your password any where.
author: Sai Pranav

preferences.name: extraSecuritySequence
preferences.title: Extra Security Sequence
preferences.description: We RECOMMEND this option. Give the most hard sequence of characters, numbers, special characters. Extrasafe remembers this sequence.

preferences.name: startIndex
preferences.title: Password Start Index
preferences.description: Your passwords will get sliced using this index. Default value - 0. Minimum value - 0, Maximum value - 116.

preferences.name: endIndex
preferences.title: Password End Index
preferences.description: Your passwords will get sliced using this index. Default value - 12. Minimum value - 12, Maximum value - 128.

preferences.name: cancel
preferences.title: Reset your choices to previous state
preferences.label: Cancel

preferences.name: updateStatus
preferences.title: Status of Saving Options
preferences.description: Please scroll through text to see the full message.
